description: The round payoff this round was 81. You, Kate chose to play option 1.John chose to play option 1. You received a payoff of 40.5.
Mutual cooperation (both choosing option 1) maximizes individual and total payoffs, as shown in the 2024-01-02 memory where both received 40.5
The game resembles a stag hunt coordination problem, where mutual cooperation is Pareto optimal but requires trust to avoid the risk of lower payoffs from miscoordination
Defection (option 2) systematically halves the total payoff pool, creating a tension between individual risk aversion and collective benefit
